body_html:
The question was for @drnikolaev about if he will add docs for this PR here or on the Nvidia official docs. Cause we need to find a way somewhere on how to recompile PyTorch/Caffe2 etc.
So if you don't want this to be documented here and Nvidia want that we are able to use Caffe2/TRT I suppose that he will add it in the TRT docs.

body:
The question was for @drnikolaev about if he will add docs for this PR here or on the Nvidia official docs. Cause we need to find a way somewhere on how to recompile PyTorch/Caffe2 etc.
So if you don't want this to be documented here and Nvidia want that we are able to use Caffe2/TRT I suppose that he will add it in the TRT docs.
